entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
